name: It's Cold Outside, Where is the Cat? (2014)
name_original: It's Cold Outside, Where is the Cat? (2014)
description:
Made this in December 2014 for One Game A Month. Original description from GameJolt:

Your silly cat has run off and got itself frozen in a block of ice! You are a dog searching through ice caves for your cat. Dig through blocks of ice for treasure and powerups, but don't run out of time!

Tools: MelonJS, notepad++, Paint.NET, Ableton Live, sfxr

Source: https://github.com/ChrisLHall/ColdCat 

Music: https://soundcloud.com/the_operator/ice-caves
